personal_introduction.title: 👋 New Team Member
personal_introduction.prompt: Hi! I'm [name], just started as a [role] at [company]. I'll be working on [area/project] and would love to learn about [specific topic].
personal_introduction.expected_response: The assistant will remember your role, company, and learning interests for future conversations.

personal_introduction.title: 🎯 Career Transition
personal_introduction.prompt: I'm [name], transitioning from [old role] to [new role]. I have experience with [skills] but need to learn [new skills] for my new position at [company].
personal_introduction.expected_response: The assistant will track your career transition and adapt learning suggestions accordingly.

project_collaboration.title: 💼 Project Planning
project_collaboration.prompt: I'm leading a [timeframe] project to [objective] at [company]. Our main challenges are [challenge1] and [challenge2]. I need help with [specific area].
project_collaboration.expected_response: The assistant will remember your project details and provide contextual help in future sessions.

project_collaboration.title: 🚀 Product Launch
project_collaboration.prompt: We're launching [product] in [timeframe]. I'm responsible for [your role] and need to coordinate [tasks]. What should I prioritize?
project_collaboration.expected_response: The assistant will track your launch timeline and responsibilities for ongoing support.

learning_journey.title: 📚 Technology Learning
learning_journey.prompt: I want to learn [technology/framework] for my work on [project type]. I prefer [learning style] and have [current experience level]. Where should I start?
learning_journey.expected_response: The assistant will remember your learning preferences and track your progress over time.

learning_journey.title: 🎓 Skill Development
learning_journey.prompt: I need to improve my [skill area] skills for my role as [position]. I learn best through [method] and have [time commitment] available per week.
learning_journey.expected_response: The assistant will create a personalized learning plan and check your progress regularly.

problem_solving.title: 🔧 Technical Challenge
problem_solving.prompt: I'm stuck on [specific problem] in [technology/context]. I've tried [attempted solutions] but [what happened]. My setup is [environment/tools].
problem_solving.expected_response: The assistant will remember your tech stack and provide targeted solutions for similar future issues.

problem_solving.title: 💡 Decision Making
problem_solving.prompt: I need to decide between [option1] and [option2] for [context]. The key factors are [factor1], [factor2], and [factor3]. What should I consider?
problem_solving.expected_response: The assistant will help analyze options and remember your decision criteria for future choices.

daily_productivity.title: 📅 Daily Planning
daily_productivity.prompt: Today I need to [list of tasks]. My priorities are [priority1], [priority2]. I work best in [time periods] and get distracted by [distractions].
daily_productivity.expected_response: The assistant will learn your work patterns and help optimize your daily planning.

daily_productivity.title: 📊 Progress Review
daily_productivity.prompt: This week I completed [accomplishments] but struggled with [challenges]. Next week I need to focus on [upcoming tasks].
daily_productivity.expected_response: The assistant will track your progress patterns and suggest improvements for productivity.

creative_collaboration.title: 🎨 Creative Project
creative_collaboration.prompt: I'm working on [creative project] with goals of [objectives]. My style is [style description] and I'm inspired by [influences]. I need help with [specific aspect].
creative_collaboration.expected_response: The assistant will remember your creative preferences and provide tailored inspiration and feedback.

creative_collaboration.title: ✍️ Content Creation
creative_collaboration.prompt: I create [content type] for [audience]. My voice is [tone/style] and I focus on [topics]. I'm struggling with [specific challenge].
creative_collaboration.expected_response: The assistant will learn your content style and help maintain consistency across projects.
